price: Nokorε sε, wͻn a wͻnnye Nyankopͻn Nsεm no nnie no, Nyankopͻn nkyerε wͻn kwan, na wͻwͻ asotwee a εyε ya paa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi lā yahdīhimu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
